root.name: The Vanishing of Ethan Carter
root.description: OverviewThe Vanishing of Ethan Carter is a horror adventure game. It's scheduled to arrive on PC via digital distribution channels sometime in 2013.The player takes on the role of a detective with the supernatural ability to visualize scenes of violent crimes which he needs to find a kidnapped boy and save him. Exploration and the discovery of clues are the main focus of the game which aims to evolve immersive storytelling in games.
